messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ive got a jar of dirt

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, not more than 15 mice have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hey unknown lifeform thing meet me at the eassst ssside of the ssstation i might not ssshoot you in your face hole

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in 5 minutes.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Aft Maintenance.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We have 2 optionsss 1 one of you voulenteeresss to become a miner with your normal job or  we beg cent for resssourcesss and i doubht that would work

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: say no more fam, resources coming into the ferry.. wait NO! CLOWN DONT TOUCH THAT BUTTON!!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: So.. the clown thought it would be a good idea to send you our "Clown research" bundle...

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The clown has been executed

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We'd prefer if you left it on the ferry, however we can make it worth your time..

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: w-what? I meant we can exhange the ore for goods of your choosing..

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The honkstaff is one of a kind, the navy want to weaponise it to slip entire fleets at once

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please send the ferry back

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Trust us, you can

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Thanks.. we needed you to kill those clowns hovering out by the docks

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Please request an item via the communications console
Paperwork and stuff

messages.author: Captain's Announcement

messages.body: SSSo what needsss doing and if you sssay ore sssilo then thatsss a padalin

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Morgue.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, not more than 15 squeaking things have migrated into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a whoop of rodents have descended into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.body: "hearsss rodendsss" hansss... get the flamenwerfer

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies dete'fZ\kg5_0-BZZZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command - Resources Department Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ey whoever the problem isss ssstop causssin a ruckusss and i will give you a pardon psss headsss promissse not to call the ssshuttle and you can resssume your dutiesss

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Hey

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Captain's Office.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: There are currently 10 geneticists, the shuttle has been recalled because of that

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chapel.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
